content:
Counting animals
 Zanele Buthelezi, Thembani
 Dladla and Clare Verbek
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One elephant is going 
 
 to drink water. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Two girafes are going 
 
 to drink water. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Thre bufaloes and four 
 
 birds are also going to 
 
 drink water. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Five impalas and six wild 
 
 pigs are walking to the 
 
 water. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Seven zebras are runing 
 
 to the water. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Eight frogs and nine fish 
 
 are swiming in the water. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One lion roars. 
 
 
 
 He also wants to drink. 
 
 
 
 Who is afraid of the lion? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One elephant is drinking 
 
 water with the lion. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
